name: cascade-css
description: A lightweight, variable-driven CSS framework focused on consistency, mathematical precision, and contextual design patterns

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:full && npm run build:theme && npm run build:patterns
scripts.build:core: sass src-lean/cascade.scss dist/cascade.css --style=expanded && sass src-lean/cascade.scss dist/cascade.min.css --style=compressed
scripts.build:full: sass src-lean/cascade-full.scss dist/cascade-full.css --style=expanded && sass src-lean/cascade-full.scss dist/cascade-full.min.css --style=compressed
scripts.build:patterns: npm run build:buttons && npm run build:cards && npm run build:forms && npm run build:badges
